019    package com.smartitengineering.dao.common.cache;
020    
021    import com.smartitengineering.domain.PersistentDTO;
022    
023    /**
024     * Event registrar for notifying domains appropriately of different persistence
025     * events generated by different DAOs'
026     * @author imyousuf
027     */
028    public interface CacheEventRegistrar {
029    
030        /**
031         * Register event listeners for certain class and change type. If type is
032         * not mentioned it will mean for all.
033         * @param observe The class type to observe. It can not be NULL.
034         * @param type The change type to observe.
035         * @param listeners Listeners to register, can not be NULL or empty
036         * @throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException If observe is NULL and/or
037         *                                            listeners is NULL or EMPTY
038         */
039        public void addCacheEventListeners(Class<? extends PersistentDTO> observe,
040                                           ChangeEvent.ChangeType type,
041                                           ChangeListener... listeners)
042            throws IllegalArgumentException;
043    
044        /**
045         * Remove the listeners from all registers.
046         * @param listeners Listeners to be removed from observation
047         */
048        public void removeListeners(ChangeListener... listeners);
049    
050        /**
051         * Fire the event to appropriate observers.
052         * @param event Event to trigger
053         */
054        public void fireEvent(ChangeEvent event);
055    }
